content.query:
-- This is auto-generated code
SELECT
    format(sum(CostInBillingCurrency), 'N', 'en-us') as Cost
    ,sum(Quantity) as Quantity
    ,UnitOfMeasure
    ,UnitPrice
    ,MeterCategory
    ,MeterSubCategory
    ,MeterName
    
    ,ResourceId
    --distinct(MeterName)

FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://s037costmgmt.dfs.core.windows.net/usage/exports/monthly/ACMMonthlyActualCost/202308*/ACMMonthlyActualCost_*.parquet',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]
    WHERE
        MeterCategory = 'Advanced Threat Protection'
        and MeterSubCategory = 'Storage'
        and MeterName = 'Standard Transactions'
        and UnitOfMeasure = '10M'
    --group by UnitOfMeasure, UnitPrice,MeterCategory,MeterSubCategory,MeterName
    --AND MeterName = 'Standard Node'
    --and ResourceId = '/subscriptions/20975cff-f8e3-402c-b04b-6e617613c0c9/resourceGroups/rg-federation-t/providers/Microsoft.Storage/storageAccounts/stfederationdlt'
    group by UnitOfMeasure
    ,UnitPrice
    ,MeterCategory
    ,MeterSubCategory
    ,MeterName
    ,ResourceId
